en-US.1-details-description: Uses User-Agent to identify the model
en-US.1-details-example:
In this example it is located under 'platform'
Mozilla/5.0 ('system-information') 'platform' ('platform-details') 'extensions'
en-US.2-details-description: Uses User-Agent to identify the OS
en-US.2-details-example:
In this example it is located under 'extensions'
Mozilla/5.0 ('system-information') 'platform' ('platform-details') 'extensions'
en-US.3-details-description: Uses User-Agent to identify the firefox version
en-US.3-details-example:
In this example it is located under 'extensions'
Mozilla/5.0 ('system-information') 'platform' ('platform-details') 'extensions'
en-US.4-details-description: Uses getFeature() with argument 'hardware.memory' to identify the amount of RAM
en-US.5-details-description: Uses getFeature() with argument 'dom.apps.developer_mode' to identify the Developer Mode status

en-US.1-details-description: Uses Window: screen property to identify the resolution
en-US.2-details-description: Uses Window: screen property to identify the color depth
en-US.3-details-description: Uses screen's width and height to calculate ratio
en-US.3-details-example: commonDivisor = gcd(window.screen.width, window.screen.height); ratioWidth = window.screen.width / commonDivisor;
en-US.4-details-description: Uses Window: screen property to identify the screen orientation

en-US.1-details-description: Uses Navigator: hardwareConcurrency property to identify the amount of cores
en-US.2-details-description: Estimates the cpu frequency by using for loops and Performance: now() method

en-US.1-details-description: Uses WebGL to initialize a context to access GPU information. It retrieves GPU renderer details using the WebGL context.
en-US.2-details-description: Uses WebGL to initialize a context to access GPU information. It retrieves GPU vendor details using the WebGL context

en-US.1-details-description: Uses navigator.mozCameras's getCamera('identifier') method to access the camera, then it reads camera.id to identify the id
en-US.1-details-example: cameraList = navigator .mozCameras .getListOfCameras(); camera = navigator .mozCameras .getCamera(camerasList[index]) id = camera.camera.id
en-US.2-details-description: Uses navigator.mozCameras's getListOfCameras() method to get camera names
en-US.3-details-description: Uses navigator.mozCameras's getCamera('identifier') method to access the camera, then it reads camera.capabilities.width and height
en-US.4-details-description: Uses navigator.mozCameras's getCamera('identifier') method to access the camera, then it reads camera.focalLength to identify the focal length
en-US.4-details-example: cameraList = navigator .mozCameras .getListOfCameras(); camera = navigator .mozCameras .getCamera(camerasList[index]) focal = camera.camera.focalLength
en-US.5-details-description: Uses navigator.mozCameras's getCamera('identifier') method to access the camera, then it reads .camera.capabilities .recorderProfiles [.configuration.recorderProfile] to identify the video resolution
en-US.6-details-description: Uses navigator.mozCameras's getCamera('identifier') method to access the camera, then it reads .camera.capabilities .recorderProfiles [.configuration.recorderProfile] to identify the video bitrate
en-US.7-details-description: Uses navigator.mozCameras's getCamera('identifier') method to access the camera, then it reads .camera.capabilities .recorderProfiles [.configuration.recorderProfile] to identify the video frametime
en-US.8-details-description: Uses navigator.mozCameras's getCamera('identifier') method to access the camera, then it reads .camera.capabilities .recorderProfiles [.configuration.recorderProfile] to identify the video codec

en-US.1-details-description: Uses navigator.getBattery() method to access the battery, then it reads .level to identify the battery level
en-US.2-details-description: Uses navigator.getBattery() method to access the battery, then it reads .health to identify the battery health
en-US.3-details-description: Uses navigator.getBattery() method to access the battery, then checks .charging time to determine if device is charging or discharging
en-US.4-details-description: Uses navigator.getBattery() method to access the battery, then it reads .temperature to identify the battery temperature
